questions.question: My car is giving me serious issues - it just dey collect suffer-head without any warning light on the dashboard. What is the real meaning of "suffer-head" here?
A child who has never experienced rain is the one who runs when dew is still on the grass. What does this Nigerian proverb mean?
options: She hasn't seen real problems yet

questions.question: Leave him, na him matching dey match. What does this phrase mean about the person's fashion?
options: He's following a style we don't understand

questions.question: What is the main quality of an "Original Lagos boy" that makes people respect him?
If a snake with no legs is still looking for money to buy shoes, what are you with legs waiting for?
That man don carry gbana enter kpangba without knowing say kpangba don turn gwongworo. What happened?
options: He carried contraband into a police van unknowingly
He moved into a new house

questions.question: That fine girl with the jelly waist and kayanmata perfume is firewood that looks like a flower. What does "firewood" mean here?
You hear a market trader shouting "See your brother!" What is he most likely selling?
That office job is awuf but e dey collect kanda. What does "kanda" mean in this context?
The mango tree in front of the house makes children forget that people sell mangoes in the market. What is the lesson?
This your car no be today e don dey do killing me softly. What is the mechanic describing?
A man who is flying always remembers that it's on the ground he finds food. What does this mean?
This country matter don pass agbero, even the organizers have lost control. What does "don pass agbero" mean?
That man's love na like pure water - when e cold, e sweet, but when e hot, e don lose value. What is she describing?
This new manager na correct guy but him dey mix gari with sand. What is the concern?
